snippet.title: PianoVision V2 Update Trailer
snippet.description:
PianoVision V2: Your Favorite Hits, At Your Fingertips

Experience the next evolution of piano learning in mixed reality with our biggest update yet! PianoVision V2 brings you an entirely reimagined interface and introduces PianoVision Plus, a premiere experience with a massive and continually growing catalog

🎵 What's New:
Access 10,000+ popular songs from The Beatles, Disney, John Legend, Ed Sheeran & more
Curated Mixed Reality environments to bring your home to life
Meet Ludwig, your personal AI piano teacher
Automated fingering suggestions
Enhanced sheet music support
Sheet music support for imports
Enhanced virtual keyboard with more precise hand tracking

Whether you're a complete beginner or an experienced pianist, PianoVision's mixed reality technology transforms your learning journey into an immersive, engaging experience. Watch as notes float above your keys, receive real-time feedback, and master your favorite songs faster than ever before.
Start your piano journey today: https://www.meta.com/experiences/pianovision/5271074762922599/

Join our Discord:
https://discord.com/invite/naWeN9ZPfP

Available on Meta Quest headsets
Compatible with all pianos and MIDI keyboards
